Input.name: customMods
Input.string: #1 50% reduced Soul Gain Prevention Duration 286% Increased vaal skill critical strike chance #2 +3 to level of all vaal skill gems #3 everlasting sacrifice shepherd of souls #4 $50% increased vaal skill effect duration $Non-Aura Vaal Skills require 50% reduced Souls Per Use during Effect OR #-5% to all Resistances for each Corrupted Item Equipped #12% increased Maximum Energy Shield for each Corrupted Item Equipped #8% increased Maximum Life for each Corrupted Item Equipped OR Skills Cost Life instead of Mana
